entries.description: Award-winning internal hackathon project for Facebook Reality Labs. ðŸ”’

entries.title: VR Neural Networks
entries.description: A visualization of neural networks in VR. Includes a neural network implementation in C# from scratch (yes, it's slow).

entries.title: Multi-modal Voice Assistant
entries.description: A voice assistant (think Siri) augmented with context selection through an AR interface.

entries.title: MADDPG Predator-Prey
entries.description: An implementation of the MADDPG algorithm with Unity ML-Agents.

entries.title: Chromatone
entries.description: A VR experience that allows interaction with individual instruments through modulation and particle visualizations.

entries.title: Mizuna
entries.description: Programmatic synchronization of graphs between IPython and Overleaf.

entries.title: BEU
entries.description: An exercise to implement fighting game mechanics in a side-scrolling beat 'em up domain.

entries.title: Messenger URL Extractor
entries.description: A quick Python script to extract all URLs from a Facebook Messenger chat conversation.

entries.title: Modular Tetris
entries.description: An exercise to implement Tetris with modular frame-timing mechanics.

entries.title: VR n-back Experiment
entries.description: A replication of the n-back task to test working memory in VR environments.

entries.title: VR Proprioception Experiment
entries.description: An experiment to investigate how challenging is it for VR users to grab objects outside of their field of view.

entries.title: Aurora
entries.description: My contributions to an open-sourced utility that unifies RGB devices across different brands for synchronized lighting.

entries.title: TIDALSign
entries.description: Learn American Sign Language through sensory gloves and haptic feedback.

entries.title: JS3Inth
entries.description: Sine wave synthesizer and modulator for FPGA boards.
